name: NSGroupTouchBarItem
desc: A bar item that provides a bar to contain other items.

items.name: init(identifier: NSTouchBarItem.Identifier, items: [NSTouchBarItem])
items.desc: Initializes and returns a group item whose bar is constructed from the supplied items.

items.name: init(identifier: NSTouchBarItem.Identifier, items: [NSTouchBarItem], allowedCompressionOptions: NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a group item whose bar is constructed from the supplied items, and with the specified compression options.

items.name: init(alertStyleWithIdentifier: NSTouchBarItem.Identifier)
items.desc: Initializes and returns a group item configured to match system alerts.

items.name: var groupTouchBar: NSTouchBar
items.desc: A bar that holds this group's items.

items.name: var groupUserInterfaceLayoutDirection: NSUserInterfaceLayoutDirection
items.desc: The user interface direction that controls the layout order of the items.

items.name: var prefersEqualWidths: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies that items should have equal widths when possible.

items.name: var preferredItemWidth: CGFloat
items.desc: The preferred width for items in the group when prefersEqualWidths is true.

items.name: var effectiveCompressionOptions: NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions
items.desc: The compression options that are currently active on the group.

items.name: var prioritizedCompressionOptions: [NSUserInterfaceCompressionOptions]
items.desc: The allowed compression options, in the order they should be applied.

items.name: var customizationLabel: String!
items.desc: The user-visible string identifying this item during bar customization.
